name: MoveGithubProjectColumn
description:
Move a column within a GitHub project board.

Use this tool to change the position of a project column in a GitHub project board to better organize tasks or workflow.

parameters.name: project_column_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the column to be moved in the GitHub project.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the column.

parameters.name: column_position
parameters.description: Specifies where to move the project column. Use `first`, `last`, or `after:<column_id>` to position after a specific column.

value_schema.description: The position of the column in a project. Can be one of: `first`, `last`, or `after:<column_id>` to place after the specified column.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: column_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the column.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the column.

parameters.name: position
parameters.description: The position of the column in a project. Can be one of: `first`, `last`, or `after:<column_id>` to place after the specified column.

value_schema.description: The position of the column in a project. Can be one of: `first`, `last`, or `after:<column_id>` to place after the specified column.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
